mapper.insert: insert into Cost(rent, water_bill, electricity_bill, gas_bill, total_labor_cost, security_maintenance_fee, conv_seq, cost_year, cost_month) values(#{rent}, #{waterBill}, #{electricityBill}, #{gasBill}, #{totalLaborCost}, #{securityMaintenanceFee},#{convSeq}, #{costYear}, #{costMonth})
mapper.update: update Cost set rent = #{rent}, water_bill = #{waterBill}, electricity_bill = #{electricityBill}, gas_bill = #{gasBill}, total_labor_cost = #{totalLaborCost}, security_maintenance_fee = #{securityMaintenanceFee} where conv_seq = #{convSeq} AND cost_year = #{costYear} AND cost_month = #{costMonth}
mapper.select: select call_total_price from Call_product_conv_order_list where conv_seq = #{convSeq} and call_status != -1 and call_status != 0
select ref, price, product_name, quantity as count from Delivery where branch_name = #{branchName} and order_status != 0

select i.qty as count, i.price as paymentPrice, i.item_name as productName, p.purchased_at as ref from Payment as p inner join Items i on i.receipt_id = p.receipt_id where p.conv_seq = #{convSeq} AND p.del != '결제취소'
